}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== * '''Intel Wireless Gigabit Sink W13100 (13100NGWG)''' (2015) • Maple Peak :''Intel WiGig Docking Module W13100'' - WiGig 802.11ad (60GHz) :RFEM: 2x 10041R, 802.11ad only, 2x 16x16 60GHz phased array :[https://fccid.io/PD913100NG FCC ID: PD913100NG] (10/28/2014) [[Intel]] L422NB85 (G Key) [http://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/wireless-products/wigig-sink-w13100.html PCB]
==See also== *[[Intel Wireless Gigabit Sink W13110 (13110NGW)]] (2017) :[https://fccid.io/PD913110NG FCC ID: PD913110NG] (03/16/2018) (13110NGW) *[[Intel Wireless Gigabit 11100 (11100D2W)]] (2017) :[https://fccid.io/PD913110NG FCC ID: PD913110NG] (03/16/2018) (11100D2W) *[[Intel Wireless Gigabit 11000 (11000D2W)]] (2015) • Pine Peak :Intel Mobile Communications, ''WiGig Adapter Card'' (802.11ad) :RFEM: 10042R, PCIe (NGFF), 802.11ad only, 60GHz phased array :[https://fccid.io/PD911000D2 FCC ID: PD911000D2] (01/29/2016) (11000NGW) *[[Intel Tri-Band Wireless-AC 18265 (18265NGW)]] NGFF Card • Oak Peak :802.11ac 2x2 (867Mbps), BT 4.2, Form Factor: NGFF M.2 2230 (Key A) :802.11ad (60GHz) WiGig wireless, combined with a AC 8265 (NBR) :RFEM 3: 10101R, abgn+ac+ad, 2x2:2, 60GHz phased array
[[Category:English Documentation]]
